job_title: Academic Program Director in Anza, CA
pros: Working  at Olivet, you will meet a group of faithful Christians who earnestly seek God and work very hard for His will to be done on earth. Coworkers are very supportive and caring. We do everything in teams and task forces. Olivet is not just a school that ends with the pursuit of knowledge, faculty members and staff work with strong sense of purpose and professional calling in their respective fields. Olivet is family-friendly. Many activities and ministries are prepared for staff and faculty families year-round.
cons: The campus is a bit far from main freeway. The campus facilities and infrastructure still need much improvement to serve the growing student body.
